name: mixit
description: Site used to manage Mixit conference (Lyon - France)

scripts.scss: node-sass src/main/sass/mixit.scss -o build/classes/css && postcss build/classes/css/mixit.css -u autoprefixer -u cssnano -o build/resources/main/static/css/mixit.css
scripts.typescript: tsc src/main/ts/*.ts --target es6 --out build/classes/js/mixit.js;terser build/classes/js/mixit.js -o build/resources/main/static/js/mixit.js
scripts.watch: onchange 'src/main/sass/*.*' -- npm run scss & onchange 'src/main/resources/templates/*.*' -- npm run copy-templates & onchange 'src/main/resources/messages*.properties' -- npm run copy-messages & echo 'Watch is started'
